kernels.name: python3
kernels.description: Default Python kernel (uses the system-installed Python environment).
kernels.notes: Ensure Python and pip are installed on your system.
kernels.select_kernel_command: Go to Kernel -> Change Kernel -> Select 'Python 3'.

kernels.name: my_virtualenv
kernels.description: Custom Python virtual environment kernel for project isolation.
kernels.notes: This setup isolates project dependencies from the system Python.
kernels.select_kernel_command: Go to Kernel -> Change Kernel -> Select 'My Virtualenv'.

kernels.name: conda_environment
kernels.description: Conda-based environment kernel for Anaconda/Miniconda users.
kernels.notes: Requires Anaconda or Miniconda to be installed.
kernels.select_kernel_command: Go to Kernel -> Change Kernel -> Select 'My Conda Env'.
